pageContext.claim: “How about Chicago? Would you say they need help after this weekend? Do you know the numbers? Did you hear the numbers? Many, many shot. Many, many killed. I'm not talking about one, two. Was it 18 people killed? I think more than that. And you add it up over the summer -- this is worse than Afghanistan, by far.”
pageContext.analysis: Comparing Afghanistan's murder rate with those of U.S. cities tells you nothing about crime or public safety -- because Afghanistan has been a warzone for many years.
